    • AdvancedGame

      public AdvancedGame(int numPlayers, List<Integer> selectedWizards, List<TeamEnum> selectedColors, List<String> nicknames, VirtualView virtualView) throws IncorrectPlayersException
      Version with observer pattern Creates a new AdvancedGame with the parameters chosen by the players, must be initialized after creation via the initializeGame() function This constructor uses the default amount of coins and character cards specified in the advanced parameters
      Parameters:
      numPlayers - number of players in the game [2,4]
      selectedWizards - array containing users' selection for their wizards
      selectedColors - array containing users' selection for their tower colors
      nicknames - array containing users' nicknames
      virtualView - the view that will hold the watchers for the model classes
      Throws:
      IncorrectPlayersException - the number of players isn't in the allowed range

      Overrides:
      createPlayers in class SimpleGame
      Parameters:
      numPlayers - the number of players to create
      selectedWizards - array containing the correspondence between player and selected wizard
      selectedColors - array containing the correspondence between player and selected tower color
      nicknames - array containing the users' nicknames

    • spendCoin

      public boolean spendCoin(AdvancedPlayer player, int coin)
      Player spends a number of coins equals to coin argument. If player does not have enough coins return false and do not subtract player coins
      Parameters:
      player - != null
      coin - > 0
      Returns:
      false if player can not spend that number of coins

    • moveFromEntranceToHall

      public void moveFromEntranceToHall(Player player)
      Move a student in selected position at Entrance in Hall table. If the player deserves a coin the game add 1 coin to player and remove 1 coin from advanced parameters. Update professors.
      Overrides:
      moveFromEntranceToHall in class SimpleGame
      Parameters:
      player - != null

      Parameters:

      idCard - of the character card
      Returns:

    • toBean

      public GameElementBean toBean()
      Overrides:
      toBean in class SimpleGame
      Returns:
      a java Bean with all general information about this game, a list with island groups id, a list of played assistants, a list of players id, the current player id, current turn number, current phase, Game coins and Character Cards id of this game
